transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Good morning sir, Rahul baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se account manager. Hanji.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Sir ek concern raise hua hai aapke account mein ye ek reviews ke related.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Kaisa?
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Haan ji jo aapko ratings ka feedback aaya na wo non genuine the to iske regarding aapke tickets open ho gaye hain jo aapne like ratings karwai hai. Non genuine ratings hai.
Customer: Maine aapko us din bhi thoda sa guide kara tha like unhi se ask for review kijiye jo like aapki catalog visit kare ya fir aapki team se baat hui hai. Baki agar ye kuch third party and all hota hai to IndiaMART isse reject kar deta hai.
Customer: Achcha. Haan. Maine waise to call karwaya tha pehle IndiaMART pe uske baad inhone review kiya hai.
Executive: Sir wo na aap jab se connect ho through lead manager wahi se sir ask for review aata hai aapko pata hai na sir?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan. Wahi se sir aap unko to unko diya hai ask for ask for review maine unko dala hai tabhi to unhone diya hai.
Executive: Isko sir non genuine lenge but char reviews to mujhe show ho rahe hain jo genuine hai ek hai 14 November ka Anupama ji ka 15 November Priyanka 14 November Syed Imran 13 November Kadoria Govind bhai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To inke reviews me to koi problem nahi hai rest koi aur reviews dale honge to uske regarding ticket open ho rakhi hai jisme like aapko guide karna tha. Hmm. Jo bhi non genuine rating hoti hai wo apply nahi hoti isko reject kar deti hai IndiaMART.
Customer: To abhi kya hoga sir?
Executive: Ye to sir iska check kar liya. Ek minute rukiye sir.

(Child speaking)
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Haan isme main check kar raha sir ye jo matlab jo bhi aap reviews le na like jo by inquiry aayi hai by call aayi hai ya fir aapne jinse lead consume kari hai. Wahi agar aap ye agar ask for review karenge to aapko future me koi problem nahi aayegi ticket open ho rakha hai isko to main ye close karwa dunga aur baki sir kya kuch problem to nahi aa rahi isme abhi tak?
Customer: Nahi.
Customer: Bas wo maine aapko GST diya tha wo GST aapne dal diya kya? Haan wo GST maine usko aage forward kar diya hai. Waha se jab update ho jayega to main uske regarding aapko update kar dunga wo humne aage wo concern forward kar diya kyuki jo proprietorship form tha. Sorry manufacturer ka tha wo hum sabse update karwa rahe hain. Aur rest ye main Anupama ji se kaise sir aapka?
Customer: Theek raha unse ho gaya.
Executive: Ho gaya sir? Okay ek aur cheez.
Executive: Sir aap jo bhi leads consume kariye na wo make sure ki aapki na zero to four hours ki ho. Isme main check kar raha hu aapne isme zero to four hours matlab wo aapko pata nahi pata hai na sir wo upar show hoti hai ki lead kitne der pehle post hui hai. Haan haan.
Executive: Haan to make sure sir wo jo aap leads consume kar rahe hain wo aap zero to four hours ke aap jyadatar consume kare jispe na hamara conversion ratio jyada hota hai. Hmm. Let suppose ha ek example lete hain ki kisi client ne kuch product ki wo dali hai inquiry client ye chahega na ki jald se jald mere pe call aaye main ise close karu saman kharid lu wo ye to chahega nahi ki main ek din tak wait karunga do din tak wait karunga. Wo to ye chahega na make sure ki jaldi jaldi mere pe call aaye main final karu saman le lu isliye hum recommend karte hain. Jaise lead koi aati hai uske niche option bana rehta hai ki itni call hui hai ya itne reply gaye hai wo kya matlab hai us cheez ka? Iska ye matlab ek to sir usme na ye show karta hai wo client kitna purana hai jaise seven years eight years one month two years. Iska matlab hai ki ye buyer itne time se IndiaMART pe saman kharid raha hai aur jo requirement likhi rehti hai na iska matlab ye hai jaise requirement usne 84 likha hai to matlab usne abhi tak IndiaMART pe 84 requirement post kari hai. Calls let suppose 19 hai to usne 19 calls kari hai. Aur aur jaise inquiry aise kuch hota hai ye matlab isne abhi tak IndiaMART me kya kya activity kari hai uska wo history hota hai basically. Client ka. Haan. Aur kuch sir?
Customer: Nahi theek hai. Dusra jaise maine dekha hai isme koi whatsapp API ka bhi kuch option hota hai connect karne ka kya? Jaise maine ko bhi dekha hai jaise hum log lead consume karte hai to automatic unko whatsapp pe message chala jata hai to usko bhi kuch connect kar sakte hai kya isse?
Executive: Unko call kar sakte hain sir normal unko whatsapp call bhi kar sakte hain aap unka number to aapko mil hi jata hai sir. Jaise lead jaise lead aati hai hamare pass hum usko call kar lete hai to automatically jaise main bhi agar IndiaMART pe koi query dalta hu to kuch company aisi hai jaisi wo meri lead ko consume kar deti hai to automatically mujhe turant hi message aa jata hai whatsapp pe.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir aap is account se koi requirement post nahi kar sakte kyuki aapka to like wo hai na sir manufacturer account agar aapko aapko separate account banana padega jispe aap requirement post kar sakte hain to waha se aap wo baki deal wheel kar sakte hain agar aap chahe to is account se aap normally bas consume karenge bhai connect karenge ye sab.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Haan ji sir. Sir mujhe karna hai mujhe ek hai na aap uska jaise proposal dala hai na maximizer ka. Haan. Mujhe proposal dal do aap TrustSeal ka. TrustSeal ka. Haan TrustSeal ka bhi mujhe dal do ek bar to usme hum log dekh lenge to ek saal ke dalna hai wo TrustSeal wala to. TrustSeal minimum aapka sir TrustSeal na minimum aapka two years ya three years hi hoga wo ek saal hai hi nahi sir. Achcha. To do saal ka dal do mujhe do ka dal do. Okay sir main aapko share karta hu. Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer raised concerns about non-genuine reviews.

- Wants to know about WhatsApp API integration.

- Wants a proposal for TrustSeal.



Resolution:

- Executive explained about non-genuine ratings policy.

- Executive informed about lead consumption.

- Executive clarified about separate account for posting requirements.

- Executive informed TrustSeal is available for 2-3 years.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will share a proposal for TrustSeal.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- reviews, trustseal, lead consumption, whatsapp api
